alert.note: Alert for Audubon; Carroll; Greene; Guthrie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 4:58AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN GREENE...NORTHERN GUTHRIE...NORTHEASTERN AUDUBON AND SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL COUNTIES THROUGH 545 AM CDT... At 457 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Jefferson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail and additional rainfall up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Ponding of water on roadways and low visibilities. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Coon Rapids, Scranton, Bayard, Bagley, Dedham, Yale, Jamaica, Willey, Ralston, Lakin Slough Game Management Area, Jefferson Municipal Airport, and Springbrook State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
